testBoardCreation


public void testBoardCreation()
All we are testing is creating a blank board that should by default be only white squares with one spot in each. We also do a very unrigorous, quick test of all the methods concerned with the basic encoding of colors and values: spots(r,c) and color(r,c) and thus getBoardValueAt(r,c)
